item.description:
We've found that starting at 9 a.m. is best for avoiding heat and crowds. We'll also try to do a better job of pairing up abilities so that everyone will feel less pressure, relax and play at a comfortable level. Bring fluids....or else!!!

After tennis, around 11:30 or by mutual agreement, the gang is invited back to my place for an intimate (don't the wrong idea, I just have a small yard) lunch. I live within 2 miles of Conard towards WH Center. I'll supply dogs and burgers and would appreciate help with sides, desserts and drinks.

A head count will be appreciated so "yes" RSVPs will be much preferred over "maybes". In fact, if you plan on coming to only tennis or only lunch, please be specific in your RSVP. Also, indicate in your response if you plan on bringing anything. Chairs would be a huge help. You can call me at 559-7983 or email me through the website. I'll provide directions at tennis. Did I forget anything?

Let's count on good weather and a great turnout. Stay in touch.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis & Lunch
